response.original_title: James Brown - Live at Chastain Park Atlanta 1980
response.overview: Experience the explosive energy of the “Godfather of Soul” in this unforgettable 1980 performance at Atlanta’s Chastain Park. Backed by his powerhouse band, James Brown delivers a non-stop set of funk, soul, and R&B classics, including Papa’s Got a Brand New Bag, Get Up Offa That Thing, and I Got You (I Feel Good). Captured at the height of his stage mastery, the concert showcases Brown’s dynamic vocals, electrifying dance moves, and unmatched showmanship that kept audiences on their feet from start to finish.
response.title: James Brown - Live at Chastain Park Atlanta 1980
